Name: Bots Crusher Arena
About the game: Bot Crusher Arena is an open top-down shooter where the player takes on the role of a cyborg participating in an arena elimination with other cyborgs. The task is to survive in the arena and defeat all enemies. Don't let the enemies hit you. Eat and earn money, upgrade armor, weapons and speed! Peculiarities: -Nice graphics -responsive controls -20 levels -4 types of harm that have different meanings
